``` cpp
int8_t hello;

int8_t add(int8_t a, int8_t b);
int8_t subtract(int8_t a, int8_t b);

void main(void) {
  hello = 1;

  while(true) {
    hello++;
    if(hello=10) {
      hello = 0;
    }
  }
}

int8_t add(int8_t a, int8_t b) {
  return a + b;
}

int8_t subtract(int8_t a, int8_t b) {
  return a - b;
}
```
